description: Provides functionality to send a command and receive a response

contents.name: led_on
contents.comment: This Commands will turn on module GPIO Led

contents.name: led_off
contents.comment: This Commands will turn off module GPIO Led

contents.description: This command will ping to specific ip address.
contents.name: ping
contents.comment: This command initiates a ping request. This will take time and is implemented as an asynchronous command

fields.name: ipAddress
fields.comment: It specifies the HostName / ip address to ping

fields.name: retryNum
fields.comment: [Optional] the number of Ping Echo Request to send 1-64 (default 4)

fields.name: length
fields.comment: [Optional] the lenght of Ping Echo Request message 32-1460 (default 32)

fields.name: timeout
fields.comment: [Optional] the timeout, in 100 ms units, waiting a single Echo Reply 1-600 (default 50)

response.name: pingResponse
response.comment: ping response is a string that is displayed as:#PING: <replyId>,<Ip Address>,<replyTime>,<ttl>
